means: 损伤外观，丑化，使失面子

sentence.Network_cn: 在钞票上乱涂乱画是违法的。

sentence.Network_en: The youths used spray paint to deface buildings during the riots.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些年轻人在抗争时用喷漆污损了建筑物的外观.

sentence.Network_en: The holy tide of Christmas all other doth deface.
sentence.Network_cn: 圣诞节的圣潮,其他的一切将被感染.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 美国法庭词汇翻译 | 法律英语翻译 ... deception 欺瞒,蒙骗 deface 毁伤外貌,污损 defamation 诽谤.

2. 结案陈词途污了的国旗defaced flags-
chalk marks deface the wall of the house ., 粉笔痕迹破坏墙壁的外观.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French desfacier, from des- (expressing removal) + face 'face'

entry.tran: 损伤…的外观;在…上乱涂乱画
entry.def: If someone defaces something such as a wall or a notice, they spoil it by writing or drawing things on it.

example.tran: 在钞票上乱涂乱画是违法的。

means.word_mean: 1. mar or spoil the appearance of;
2. deface a building facade, for example

auth_sentence.content: He also urged fans not to allow the countries' history to deface the game.
auth_sentence.res_content: He also urged fans not to allow the countries' history to deface the game.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He also urged fans not to allow the countries' history to deface the game.

stems_affixes.word_buile: facet[n.[问题等的]侧面,一面;[多面体的]面]+ious……的→做事表面化→轻浮的
in不+efface[v.擦掉,抹去]+able可以……的→adj.抹不掉的,不能消除的
efface[v.擦掉,抹去]+ment表名词→n.抹消, 抹杀
face脸,面→n.脸,面貌;表情;正面 v.面对着;朝,面向

stems_affixes.value_cn: 分界面, 接触面,界面
stems_affixes.word_buile: inter在……之间+face脸,面→n.分界面, 接触面,界面
